definition: of or relating to or characteristic of the country of Romania or its people or languages, a person from Romania or of Romanian descent
details:
adjective
- of or relating to or characteristic of the country of Romania or its people or languages
= example: of or relating to or characteristic of the country of Romania or its people or languages
= synonyms: Rumanian, Roumanian
noun
- a person from Romania or of Romanian descent
= example: a person from Romania or of Romanian descent
- the Romanian language
= example: the Romanian language
